snippet: The Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index fell less than 0.1 percent, while the Dow Jones industrial average rose by about the same fraction.
abstract: Stocks start slow in first day of 2015 trading as investors readjust to new year amid signs that economic growth in Europe and Asia will be modest.
lead_paragraph: The Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index fell less than 0.1 percent, while the Dow Jones industrial average rose by about the same fraction.

headline.main: Market Mixed as Investors Assess the Outlook for the New Year
headline.print_headline: Market Mixed as Investors Assess Outlook for 2015
